Heroes.Description: - Now does pull ups on the zipline once again (this is a buff)
- Can now use multiple air dashes while using Rain of Fire
- Base bullet damage increased from 5.3 to 5.6
- Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.55 to 0.5
- Health growth per boon reduced from +41 to +35
- Base health growth per boon increased from +45 to +50
- Improved firing arm position to be a little bit more out of the way from the reticle
- Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.5 to 0.4
- Health growth per boon reduced from +41 to +35
- Fixed left clicks sometimes deselecting the ability when charges aren't ready
- Primary Fire redesigned to make it more usable and have improved damage and scaling
- Now has an Alt Fire that has limited range, but deals AOE damage that cannot headshot
- Base movement speed reduced from 6.5 to 6

Items.Description: - Fixed selling an item not removing charges correctly. Now you can't buy {{ItemIcon|Extra Charge}} Extra Charge and immediately sell it and keep that readied charge.
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Sharpshooter}} Sharpshooter showing up in stats for bullet velocity even though it doesn't increase your bullet velocity
- Added new effects for {{ItemIcon|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip
- Added {{ItemIcon|Shadow Weave}} Shadow Weave cast and ambush sounds
- Bullet Resist vs NPC increased from 30% to 35%
- Heal from heroes increased from 30 to 35
- Bullet Velocity reduced from +35% to +30% (now has an upgrade)
- Active {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate reduced from 30% to 25%
- {{ItemIcon|Bullet Armor}} Bullet Armor increased from 10% to 15%
- Now steadily ramps back down to 0% when you stop shooting rather than instantly emptying
- Active Bullet Resistance reduced from 40% to 30%
- No longer provides bonus headshot damage
- Max Bullet Resist increased from 36% to 40%

- Added new T3 Weapon Item, {{ItemIcon|Headhunter}} Headhunter: Requires {{ItemIcon|High-Velocity Mag}} High-Velocity Mag. Grants +50% Bullet Velocity, +15% Weapon Damage and +150 Bullet Shield. Passive cooldown: Landing a headshot on heroes deals bonus +140 Damage, heals you for +8% Max HP and grants +2 m/s for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 6 seconds.
- Fixed not applying spirit bonus damage from {{ItemIcon|Vindicta}} Vindicta and {{ItemIcon|Wraith}} Wraith abilities
- Effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 35% to 40%
- No longer grants +1.5 {{ItemIcon|Health Regen}} Health Regen
- Now also grants +8% {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate while active
- Now has also 15% Heal Reduction Resist ({{ItemIcon|Leech}} Leech no longer has it)
- Air Jump/Dash Distance reduced from +40% to +30%
- Effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 35% to 40%
- Damage taken duration threshold reduced from 12s to 11s
- No longer has 30% Heal Reduction Resist
- Can now be cast while channeling
- Fixed being able to purchase globally during its brief respawn period
- Fixed the camera moving away from the player if you will respawn, rather than following the ragdoll
- Spirit Shield health increased from +200 to +300
- {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate slow reduced from -40% to -30%
- {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate reduction reduced from -30% to -25%
- Faster Time Between Charges increased from +40% to +55%
- Cooldown for charged abilities increased from +20% to +25%
- {{ItemIcon|Imbued Ability}} Imbued Ability Spirit Power increased from +28 to +34
- {{ItemIcon|Health Regen}} Health Regen increased from 2 to 3
- You are now unslowable while on the {{ItemIcon|Magic Carpet}} Magic Carpet
- Base Spirit Resist reduction increased from -12% to -15%
- {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate now scales with Spirit (0.25)
- {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate scaling with spirit reduced from 0.375 {{ItemIcon|Fire Rate}} Fire Rate per Spirit to 0.3

Abilities.Description: - Fixed bug with {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash not hearing his own {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike impact explosion sound
- Added custom effects for Abram's {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact T3 buff
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash {{AbilityIcon|Grapple}} Grapple cast sound
- Added hit confirm audio functionality to {{AbilityIcon|Warden}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask
- Improved some {{AbilityIcon|Binding Word}} Binding Word effects to be less noisy
- Improved clarity of {{AbilityIcon|Dynamo}} Dynamo {{AbilityIcon|Singularity}} Singularity sound for team and opponents
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask projectile effect
- Spirit damage scaling increased from 0.2 to 0.24
- {{AbilityIcon|Infernal Resilience}} Infernal Resilience Regeneration Time increased from 16s to 18s (this is a nerf)
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge sometimes stunning enemies on stairs
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact sometimes not going to the area selected
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook now only targets enemies when used by default. If you use with alt cast (middle mouse) it will be ally only mode.
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam can now be canceled by using Parry
- {{AbilityIcon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using Parry
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse not traveling properly when cast near corners
- {{AbilityIcon|Singularity}} Singularity cast time increased from 0.1 to 0.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Singularity}} Singularity range reduced from 9m to 8m
- {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot collision size reduced by 8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot base damage reduced from 105 to 100
- {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot T2 reduced from +70 to +65
- {{AbilityIcon|Immobilizing Trap}} Immobilizing Trap root duration reduced from 2s to 1.25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Immobilizing Trap}} Immobilizing Trap now applies a 50% movement slow for 1 seconds after the root
- {{AbilityIcon|Immobilizing Trap}} Immobilizing Trap T2 changed from +1s Root to +2s Slow
- {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger impact damage happens immediately, rather than after the brief drowsy period
- {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger drowsy period before sleep kicks in increased from 0.25 to 0.35
- {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger cooldown reduced from 27s to 25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Smoke}} {{AbilityIcon|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb radius reduced from 20m to 18m
- {{AbilityIcon|Fixation}} Fixation T2 max stacks increased from +30 to +40
- {{AbilityIcon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance now provides +2 Weapon Damage in the base ability (similar to the T1)
- Reduced vertical reach on {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash dps
- {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash speed is now affected by slows
- {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash trail now gets wider with Ability Range bonus
- {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash T1 duration reduced from 7s to 6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Catalyst}} Catalyst Damage Amplification reduced from 30% to 25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Catalyst}} Catalyst T3 Damage Amplification increased from +10% to +15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Catalyst}} Catalyst T2 reduced from +20% Lifesteal to +15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T2 reduced from +3 m/s to +2
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop no longer silences allies
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop now causes allies to deal 50% less damage while being carried
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop movement adjusted to be a little less frantic
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop bomb disappearing if you cancel your ultimate after dropping it but before it lands
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop self cast cast time increased from 1s to 2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop max move speed reduced from 20 to 18
- During {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop flight you can pitch up and down with Dash/Crouch buttons
- Fixed getting stuck under bridges and in buildings while {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop flying
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam max slow increased from 60% to 80%
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam now affects soul orbs (secures/denies them)
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam T3 range reduced from 15m to 13m
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ice Path}} Ice Path jitter
- {{AbilityIcon|Frost Grenade}} Frost Grenade T2 Heal increased from 135 to 145
- {{AbilityIcon|Grapple}} Grapple no longer gives a stamina charge on use
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Paradox}} {{AbilityIcon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap still going through even if {{AbilityIcon|Paradox}} Paradox dies during it
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage amp reduced from 8% to 7% per stack
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage amp visual not showing properly
- {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge radius increased from 5m to 6m
- {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge T2 radius increased from +7m to +8m
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud spirit power scaling reduced from 1.1 to 0.8
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud time to reach maximum radius reduced from 6s to 3s
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud Now provides +20% Bullet Resistance in the base ability
- {{AbilityIcon|Slice and Dice}} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +100 to +85
- {{AbilityIcon|Slice and Dice}} Slice and Dice T3 now considers creeps for only half value
- {{AbilityIcon|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting deferred damage reduced from 35% to 30%
- The targeting UI for {{AbilityIcon|Shiv}} Shiv's {{AbilityIcon|Killing Blow}} Killing Blow is now more clear about when the target will be killed
- {{AbilityIcon|Stake}} Stake duration reduced from 2.25s to 2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar Spirit Power duration scaling reduced from 0.05 to 0.04
- {{AbilityIcon|Splatter}} Splatter Spirit Scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.5
- {{AbilityIcon|Splatter}} Splatter Damage on 2nd and 3rd hit increased from 66% and 33% to 70% and 50%
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch damage increased from 100% to 110% of Light Melee
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch T2 is now +50 damage and +20% movement slow (was -10s cooldown)
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch T3 is now -12s cooldown (was +80 damage and +20% movement slow)
- delay before punch increased from 0.25s to 0.35s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball Spirit Scaling increased from 1.05 to 1.3
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball acceleration increased
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball base turn radius and turn radius after bouncing has been increased
- Fixed a bug where {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball would have the direction and trail particle stuck on
- {{AbilityIcon|Power Slash}} Power Slash max damage time requirement reduced from 1.5s to 1.4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Power Slash}} Power Slash collision radius reduced by 8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Crimson Slash}} Crimson Slash radius increased from 12m to 13m
- Fixed being able to die during {{AbilityIcon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation if hit by {{AbilityIcon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon's Owl
- Fixed some cases where {{AbilityIcon|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike could get into a stuck state
- Fixed some cases where {{AbilityIcon|Crimson Slash}} Crimson Slash would appear to be cast when it wasn't

General.Description: - Added a new Profile page that displays a breakdown of recent matches and all-time player and hero statistics (Note: the newly added stats 'Souls Collected' and 'Healing' are starting at 0 for all players)
- Added Report button to ESC menu player list to allow reporting of teammates in-game
- Improved visibility of report button on post-game screen
- You can now drag-and-drop items between categories in Builds
- Added search to the Public Builds list, you can search by keyword within build names
- Newly published hero builds now store the language of the build
- Added 'Show All Languages' checkbox in Public Builds list, can be unchecked to only see builds in your language
- Fixed issue with builds list not updating when changing between heroes in sandbox
- Added localization support for German, Polish, and Korean.
- Matchmaking window is now open 1 hour earlier on weekdays and weekends
- Players can only pause once per game
- A team can only pause at most 3 times in total amongst all the players
- The game application now flashes when the game is unpaused
- Various client and server performance improvements
- Added streamer setting to the options panel. Causes player names in the game UI panels to be hidden.
- Added a Melee Trainer bot in the 'gym' area of hero sandbox
- Added new "Game out of Date" status message at the top of the hud, so you can quickly know when there is an update rather than finding out at queue time
- Added a checkbox on the post game survey to make it not show again in the future
- Items now show their spirit power impact when using alt
- Fixed profile match history not remembering the history page you were on
- Added Heal Amp and Debuff Resist to the Vitality stats in the shop
- Hero details on the dashboard now show spirit information with alt, rather than requiring you to be in-game (this was added in a hotfix patch recently)
- The game will now prevent any quick ability upgrades for 2 seconds after death, to help prevent against accidental upgrades
- Can now reliably spectate a friend's game via the Friendlist
- Miscellaneous fixes to friends and party menus
- Added unavailable state to Zipline UI when zipline is on damage cooldown

- Spectating controls now use Left/Right mouse buttons to switch between players on a team and space to switch teams. This now works with free cursor mode, and you can still click on portraits/minimap to spectate individual heroes.
- Added new respawn countdown music 5 seconds before respawn
- Added alternate shop music which plays in the neutral shop
- Spectator count is now shown in-game
- Player names are now shown to spectators
- Added object motion blur
- Optimized performance of distance field ambient occlusion
- Fixed some tooltips not showing golden statue bonuses if it wasn't the direct stat (i.e. you got fire rate but bullets per second didn't show the golden statue)
- Fixed a bug that caused items in the build page to not be dimmed when the shop was out of range
- Fixed the disarmed spinner not showing up on your crosshair when you get disarmed
- Build list will now refresh if you change heroes in the sandbox
- Fixed Zipline speed from Base Guardian killing and Zip booster ability not stacking properly
- Fixed Base Guardian boost not properly doing its ramp up and instead instantly being fast
- Fixed a bug where someone could be holding down M1 and still be attacking when the magic carpet arrives
- Removed wind and city ambient looping sounds
- Volume and playback tweaks to one shot ambient sounds
- Removed vent sounds in places where vents had been removed
- Fixed some spectator music bugs
- Updated negative feedback sound for clarity
- Updated bounce pad sound
- Increased charged melee volume and falloff for victims
- Reduced likelihood of irrelevant announcer and hero dialog lines playing during combat exchanges
- Soul jar return effect tinted red like minimap to make it more clear it's the return location
- Player's low health screen effect more visible for longer if you're below 20% of your max HP
- Teleporter model and effect updated
- Fixed bullets hitting the world immediately when looking sharply upward
- Fixed Sinner's Sacrifice not always correctly animating
- Fixed an issue where some kill lines that were only intended for the killer were playing for the victim as well (killstreak taunts still play for everyone)
- Some heroes can now comment on being alone in enemy territory, losing sight of an injured enemy, or leaving their teammates alone in a lane
- Fixed a bunch of minor typos / grammar errors in various texts
- Added 'Express' state to zipline indicators when speed had increased from defeating Enemy Base Guardians

Misc Gameplay.Description: - Added wall jumping (does not consume stamina, requires input direction away from the wall, can be done once)
- Moved a flex slot from "Set of enemy Base Guardians" to "All Enemy Lane Guardians"
- Added ropes to some buildings to let you climb up (hold jump key to latch onto them). Can shoot while hanging on them.
- A pair of teleporters has been added to the outer lanes at the midpoint (near the three red neutral creeps)
- Four teleporters have changed locations
- The upper floor teleporters have moved to the street level
- The interior teleporters have moved to the Bodega building and the Theater
- Teleporters are closed for the first 10 minutes (they look visually closed)
teleporter_locations_screenshots_update.jpg
- Guardians no longer give 1 AP
- AP is now added to the following Soul levels: 3500, 5200, 8000, 9700
- Parry cooldown reduced from 6s to 5s
- Urn delivery sprint bonus increased from +2 to +3
- The minimum range the player must be to attack a walker is increased from 30m to 32m
- Golden Statues drop rate increased by 6%
- Replaced some bounce pads with ropes if the purpose was to go straight up
- Added two bounce pads next to sidelane walkers at cultural center and courthouse
- Added bounce pad from the Amber Orange/Sapphire Blue Walker walkway to the low roofs toward the Walker.
new_bouncepad.png
- Removed some rooftop zap volumes that damage players
- Several buildings have been made taller to make their rooftops out of bounds
- Several buildings have been made shorter to make them more accessible
valid_rooftop_locations.png
- A few of the buildings have new passageways at higher floors that are along the way to the rooftop
- Breakable containers have been added to the new playable rooftops
- Juke closets have replaced the previous location of the upper floor teleporters
- The half of the underground tunnel towards the outer lanes has been made wider
- Tunnel walls now have the color of the lane that the exit is closest to
- Removed the archway leading to the underground shop
- Placed temporary signage for interior buildings and storefronts for future reference
- Two upper floor juke spots have been converted to passages through buildings
- Added a new upper floor juke spot to each side
- Stairwell from Amber Orange/Sapphire Blue Walker catwalk to the courtyard now less cramped
- Lowered the statue pedestals in the inner lanes outside of Mid

Weapon Items.Description: - Hollow Point Rounds: Spirit Shield increased from +80 to +85

Vitality Items.Description: - Enchanter's Barrer: Now also grants +8% Cooldown Reduction while active

Spirit Items.Description: - Quicksilver: No longer has +10% Reload Time
